heading: About Me
text: Learn more about my profesional background as a software engineer and my values surronding work and technology

heading: Elden Ring Search UI
text: A search UI project based on using the Elden Ring API as a data source.  An example of using an API to gather, sort, and filter data

heading: Star Bucket: Game Notes
text: A place to store notes on games I've played.  I would like to use this as a way to practice my writing skills and to share my thoughts on the games I've played.

heading: Video Game List Challenge
text: Based on a disagreement between friends surronding a Rolling Stones article.  A challenge was cast to create two lists. One list being my personal list of all time greatest games. Another list of the most important games to the world.
